text: @realDonaldTrump So when  you said "Make America Great Again" what constitutes "Greatness"? Being Impeached by Congress? Loosing the "Majority" in Congress to Demicrats? Having 100,000 deaths due to COVID19 & ALL under your watch?  No Wall paid for by Mexico? #VoteTrump4MoreBS #TransitionToBiden
